name: Explorer (Boxo Games)
description: It is a game about exploration (hence the title) and you play as a simple character as you move around a vast area of hills and mountains. Now this is only the first version of Explorer at the moment but Version 1 is available to download NOW! You can also get this on Gamejolt (https://gamejolt.com/games/explorer/382418). Please give us feedback on the game and stay tuned!
